trans-unit.source: Provides a label adapter class for the HTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 为 HTML 适配器集提供标签适配器类。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.
trans-unit.target: 此类主要由自定义移动页面和控件适配器的开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlLabelAdapter"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 返回关联控件的强类型化的引用。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 对关联控件的强类型化的引用。

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*> method to perform rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由该控件调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>方法来执行呈现。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 要接收输出的文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: Scans a string to determine whether it contains white space characters.
trans-unit.target: 扫描字符串以确定其是否包含空白字符。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Contains the string to be checked.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if string contains white space characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符串包含空白字符;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
